subject: Jameleon or any JUnit extensions?
msgSnippet: Hi, Jameleon looks like one option for automating functional testing of our J2EE application. Its more like a framework for automating/categorizing tests but
messageBody:
Hi,

Jameleon looks like one option for automating functional testing of our
J2EE application. Its more like a framework for automating/categorizing
tests but depends on plugins. i.e., it is as powerful as the plugins
available for it. Anyone who has any interesting suggestion or approach
on how to go about testing UI?

I would love to hear comments on Jameleon as well.

Thanks
Priyank
